InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input of the filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShiftGlobalNumberingToZero
IntVectorProperty.label: Shift Global Numbering to Zero
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Shift the global number of the particle tags s.t. it starts from zero. This is required if the input dataset has tags starting from one.

IntVectorProperty.name: Extent
IntVectorProperty.label: Extent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets the extent of the domain.

IntVectorProperty.name: Fringe
IntVectorProperty.label: Fringe
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets the fringe parameter that is used to resolve artifacts on periodic boundaries. By default, the value is set to 1.

IntVectorProperty.name: Space
IntVectorProperty.label: Sets the desired space, euler or langrangian (initial)
